attributes.action: Childrean to walk to school,or catch the buses,no cars to school!
attributes.additional_details: Parents should not be allowed to take there Childrean to school in cars.Accept for special needs childrean.Childrean should either walk to school or catch a bus.This would free up the roads and motorways,like it is during school holidays?This would save £££ for all companys.One car 1_3 childrean,one bus 78 childrean?most Childrean can easily walk to school !

rejection.details: How could such a ban work?  How close to a school could a parent drive without it counting as driving their children to the school?
